## SEO Checklist
Before merging, ensure the following:

- [ ] **Meta Tags**: Title, Description, and OG tags are present and dynamic.
- [ ] **SSR Verification**: View Source (Ctrl+U) shows content, not just a loading spinner.
- [ ] **Images**: All new images have `alt` text and `width/height` attributes.
- [ ] **Links**: External links use `rel="noopener noreferrer"`.
- [ ] **Performance**: No new render-blocking scripts added in `<head>`.
- [ ] **Mobile**: Verified layout on mobile viewport.
- [ ] **Lighthouse**: Ran Lighthouse audit locally (Score > 90).
